entries.source: Enter snippets here. Remember to add a comma after each snippet, and escape all backslashes with an extra \. Lines starting with "//" will be treated as comments and ignored.
entries.translated: Enter snippets here. Remember to add a comma after each snippet, and escape all backslashes with an extra \. Lines starting with "//" will be treated as comments and ignored.

entries.source: Load snippets from file or folder
entries.translated: Load snippets from file or folder

entries.source: Whether to load snippets from a specified file, or from all files within a folder (instead of from the plugin settings).
entries.translated: Whether to load snippets from a specified file, or from all files within a folder (instead of from the plugin settings).

entries.source: What key to press to expand non-auto snippets.
entries.translated: What key to press to expand non-auto snippets.

entries.source: Make equations more readable by hiding LaTeX syntax and instead displaying it in a pretty format.
entries.translated: Make equations more readable by hiding LaTeX syntax and instead displaying it in a pretty format.

entries.source: LaTeX beneath the cursor will be revealed.
entries.translated: LaTeX beneath the cursor will be revealed.

entries.source: Disabled by default to not confuse new users. However, I recommend turning this on once you are comfortable with the plugin!
entries.translated: Disabled by default to not confuse new users. However, I recommend turning this on once you are comfortable with the plugin!

entries.source: How long to delay the reveal of LaTeX for, in milliseconds, when the cursor moves over LaTeX. Defaults to 0 (LaTeX under the cursor is revealed immediately).
entries.translated: How long to delay the reveal of LaTeX for, in milliseconds, when the cursor moves over LaTeX. Defaults to 0 (LaTeX under the cursor is revealed immediately).

entries.source: Can be set to a positive number, e.g. 300, to delay the reveal of LaTeX, making it much easier to navigate equations using arrow keys.
entries.translated: Can be set to a positive number, e.g. 300, to delay the reveal of LaTeX, making it much easier to navigate equations using arrow keys.

entries.source: When the cursor is adjacent to a bracket, highlight the matching bracket.
entries.translated: When the cursor is adjacent to a bracket, highlight the matching bracket.

entries.source: When inside an equation, show a popup preview window of the rendered math.
entries.translated: When inside an equation, show a popup preview window of the rendered math.

entries.source: The popup preview will be shown for all inline math equations, as well as for block math equations in Source mode.
entries.translated: The popup preview will be shown for all inline math equations, as well as for block math equations in Source mode.

entries.source: Where to display the popup preview relative to the equation source.
entries.translated: Where to display the popup preview relative to the equation source.

entries.source: The fraction symbol to use in the replacement. e.g. \frac, \dfrac, \tfrac
entries.translated: The fraction symbol to use in the replacement. e.g. \frac, \dfrac, \tfrac

entries.source: A list of environments to exclude auto-fraction from running in. For example, to exclude auto-fraction from running while inside an exponent, such as e^{...}, use ["^{", "}"]
entries.translated: A list of environments to exclude auto-fraction from running in. For example, to exclude auto-fraction from running while inside an exponent, such as e^{...}, use ["^{", "}"]

entries.source: A list of characters that denote the start/end of a fraction. e.g. if + is included in the list, "a+b/c" will expand to "a+\frac{b}{c}". If + is not in the list, it will expand to "\frac{a+b}{c}".
entries.translated: A list of characters that denote the start/end of a fraction. e.g. if + is included in the list, "a+b/c" will expand to "a+\frac{b}{c}". If + is not in the list, it will expand to "\frac{a+b}{c}".

entries.source: A list of environment names to run the matrix shortcuts in, separated by commas.
entries.translated: A list of environment names to run the matrix shortcuts in, separated by commas.

entries.source: Whether to automatically enlarge brackets containing e.g. sum, int, frac.
entries.translated: Whether to automatically enlarge brackets containing e.g. sum, int, frac.

entries.source: A list of symbols that should trigger auto-enlarge brackets, separated by commas.
entries.translated: A list of symbols that should trigger auto-enlarge brackets, separated by commas.

entries.source: Assign snippet variables that can be used as shortcuts when writing snippets.
entries.translated: Assign snippet variables that can be used as shortcuts when writing snippets.

entries.source: Load snippet variables from file or folder
entries.translated: Load snippet variables from file or folder

entries.source: Whether to load snippet variables from a specified file, or from all files within a folder (instead of from the plugin settings).
entries.translated: Whether to load snippet variables from a specified file, or from all files within a folder (instead of from the plugin settings).

entries.source: Snippet variables file or folder location
entries.translated: Snippet variables file or folder location

entries.source: Symbols that will be treated as word delimiters, for use with the "w" snippet option.
entries.translated: Symbols that will be treated as word delimiters, for use with the "w" snippet option.

entries.source: Remove trailing whitespaces in snippets in inline math
entries.translated: Remove trailing whitespaces in snippets in inline math

entries.source: Whether to remove trailing whitespaces when expanding snippets at the end of inline math blocks.
entries.translated: Whether to remove trailing whitespaces when expanding snippets at the end of inline math blocks.

entries.source: Remove closing $ when backspacing inside blank inline math
entries.translated: Remove closing $ when backspacing inside blank inline math

entries.source: Whether to also remove the closing $ when you delete the opening $ symbol inside blank inline math.
entries.translated: Whether to also remove the closing $ when you delete the opening $ symbol inside blank inline math.

entries.source: Don't trigger snippets when IME is active
entries.translated: Don't trigger snippets when IME is active

entries.source: Whether to suppress snippets triggering when an IME is active.
entries.translated: Whether to suppress snippets triggering when an IME is active.

entries.source: Code languages to interpret as math mode
entries.translated: Code languages to interpret as math mode

entries.source: Codeblock languages where the whole code block should be treated like a math block, separated by commas.
entries.translated: Codeblock languages where the whole code block should be treated like a math block, separated by commas.
